Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and the initial underwater conflict, then shifts to Duke O'Dowd's taxi driver persona and the unfolding mystery on land, setting up the central premise and initial conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction of Human Meteor
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor and initial underwater confrontation with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd transitions to his taxi driver identity, picks up suspicious passengers, and suspects he is being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion
Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Street Level Confrontation and Hospital Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts 'cop shooters', gets injured, and learns about a yacht and submarine plot in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Stowaway Mission
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with police and Toby, and Toby's stowaway mission begins, immediately encountering trouble.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Submarine Reveal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation on the yacht, leading to the discovery of the submarine plot and Duke's reveal as Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Suspicion and Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Pete's suspicion and Duke's undercover investigation leading to the depth chart discovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Conflict and Torpedo Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to underwater action, introducing Namor and depicting the escalating conflict with divers and the revelation of the torpedo threat.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Dive and Submarine Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Namor's arrival and initial underwater encounter, leading to the discovery of the torpedo operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Submarine Escape
sub_scenes.description: Namor's underwater fight against divers and the submarine's attempt to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Attack and Shipboard Panic
sub_scenes.description: Namor uses torpedoes to attack, causing chaos on the ship and near-disaster with a geyser.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Pursuit and Espionage Uncovered
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts back to the yacht, focusing on Namor's pursuit, the discovery of Peter's betrayal, and the resolution of the yacht/submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Chase and Peter's Death
sub_scenes.description: Namor chases the yacht and discovers Peter's body, leading to suspicion of foul play.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet

sub_scenes.title: Peter's Cabin Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Investigation of Peter's cabin reveals his connection to the Japanese Navy, quickly resolved.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Namor visits Holden in the hospital, followed by Duke, Holden, and Toby returning home, concluding the yacht/submarine incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Nazi Fiends Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends, leading to an ambulance incident and a new mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads confront Nazi Fiends, followed by the arrival of an ambulance observed by two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Garage Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet with a garage address, leading them to investigate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Capture and Mr. Horst Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' investigation at the garage, leading to their capture and interrogation by Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Interception and Journey to Horst
sub_scenes.description: Boys are intercepted by police, wallet found, and taken to Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Lead Pipe Threat, and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, a violent plan is discussed, and Major Bronson intervenes.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Violent Intervention and Boys' Escape
sub_scenes.description: Bronson intervenes violently, prompting chaos and an escape plan for the boys amidst escalating danger.

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Secret Office, and Sabotage Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys' escape, their discovery of the secret office, and the revelation of the sabotage plot, leading to marine intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Escape Plan and Waterfront Help Seeking
sub_scenes.description: Boys decide to split up, one to stay with Major, one to seek help at the waterfront.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Secret Office Discovery and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Boys find the secret office and uncover sabotage plans, revealing the 'Transcontinental' threat.

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks Crash and Office Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to action at the Marine Barracks, a car crash, and a tense office standoff involving Skip and Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Car Crash at Marine Barracks
sub_scenes.description: A car crashes at the Marine Barracks, prompting immediate military response.

sub_scenes.title: Skip's Defense and Office Stand-off
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself in an office, leading to a stand-off with Major Bronson.

Major_Arcs.title: Marines' Arrival, Fight, and Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc culminates in the Marines' arrival, a violent fight, medical aid for the Major, and recognition of their victory over the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Marines' Arrival and Immediate Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, Major collapses, and villains react menacingly.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new story with 'The Champ' and Henry in a South American town, embroiled in a mystery involving 'Hitler tools'.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and Henry, setting the scene in South America against 'Hitler tools'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rosita Kidnapping Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Champ is interrogated, then dismissed, leading to his decision to seek consul and the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Plot and Rosita's Rescue Mission Begins
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc reveals El Tigre's demands and the start of a forced journey, leading to a rescue mission for Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition of El Tigre's ransom demands, followed by a forced journey to a house.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Hideout Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Clarification of rescue plan, approach to hideout, and stealthy infiltration using stage dollar diversion.

Major_Arcs.title: Chaos and Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the chaotic search for Rosita within the hideout, the discovery of Axis agents, and the eventual rescue and recognition.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation, Search for Rosita, and Axis Agent Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation and trash talk, desperate search for Rosita, and revelation of Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Internal Dispute, Rescue Mission, and Horseback Ride
sub_scenes.description: Internal dispute over El Tigre, urgent news of Rosita's location, and the start of a horseback rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit and attack, hotel infiltration planning, hotel entry, and Rosita's rescue amidst combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear

sub_scenes.title: Final Confrontation and Recognition
sub_scenes.description: Street brawl, Rosita's bravery, government troops' arrival, and Champ's recognition for heroism.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, fighting spies and dealing with betrayal related to sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, followed by a grave report and Canal Zone discussion.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks in the jungle, is observed, narrowly escapes a dart attack, and faces a native swarm.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Capture and interrogation of spies, threat of hot iron, and betrayal under pressure.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Fiery Diversion and Jungle Fight Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Dolan expresses regret, fiery diversion is set, huts burn, and Dolan encounters natives again.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Surrender and American Brawlers
sub_scenes.description: Ship captain decides to surrender, leading to a surprise encounter and a brawl with 'American' fighters.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigation and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into a murder case, leading to the reveal of a blood transfusion need and community support, culminating in a birthday celebration.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Newspaper Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their newspaper assignment to investigate a murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins Story
Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Blood Need Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Hospital visit, nurse's refusal, press pass access, and revelation of sick child and blood transfusion need.

narrative_arcs.title: Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Candy Store Call and Irish Section Search
sub_scenes.description: Candy store phone call to Elijah, new lead to check files, and decision to search the Irish section.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Inquiry in the Irish section, invitation to talk to Mrs. Murphy, and her revelation of Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Violent Arrival and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Farnacci's violent arrival, a quick getaway, cab chase, roadblock, street brawl, and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Blood Transfusion
sub_scenes.description: Emergency medical response, hospital wait, blood transfusion need, community blood drive, and successful transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Demand for Farnacci's blood, police plan, raid and arrest of Farnacci, forced blood donation, and birthday celebration for Reilly's daughter's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
